speaker: Bloggers
vclaim: Says Christine Blasey Ford and her lawyer were photographed with George Soros, Hillary Clinton.
date: stated on September 26, 2018 in In a Facebook post:
title: No, Christine Blasey Ford not pictured with Hillary Clinton, George Soros
text:
Viral images circulating on Facebook purporting to show Christine Blasey Ford with prominent Democrats are mislabeled.
Ford accused Supreme Court Justice nominee Brett Kavanaugh of sexual assault, and will testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Sept. 27, 2018. Kavanaugh has denied the allegations.
The Facebook post below attempts to discredit Ford by linking her to Hillary Clinton and liberal philanthropist George Soros. The photos are taken out of context.

The top image purports to show Ford’s lawyer with Hillary Clinton. It’s not. It’s actually Barbara Kinney, Clinton’s photographer. Below is a picture of Kinney via the Associated Press with former President Bill Clinton in 1995, when she was the White House photographer.

Featured Fact-check
















Facebook posts


stated on January 11, 2021 in a Facebook post








Nancy Pelosi is no longer the Speaker of the House












By Samantha Putterman • January 12, 2021








The bottom image purports to show Ford with Soros. The woman pictured is not Ford, but Lyudmyla Kozlovska, a Ukrainian human rights activist. Below, via the Associated Press, is Kozlovska with her husband, Bartosz Kramek, during an anti-government protest in Warsaw in 2017. 

We rate this statement Pants on Fire!
